verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
सधै येशू महिमित छन्
सधै येशू उचालिन्छन
Forever, he is glorified
Forever, he is lifted high

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
सदाकोलाई बौरनुभो
जिबित छन उनि
जिबित छन येशू
Forever, He is risen
He is alive
He is alive

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
गाउछौ हल्लेलुया
थुमाको बिजय छ
We sing hallelujah
The lamb has overcome

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
धन्य भन प्रभुलाई मेरो प्राण
आराधना पबित्र गाऊ कहिले नगायझै
Bless the Lord oh my soul
Oh my soul
Worship His Holy name
Sing like never before

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
मेरो प्राण, आराधना पबित्र
Oh my soul
I’ll worship Your Holy name
